forum.content:
夢醒時分

淡淡的哀傷，心痛的感覺

珍惜總在失去後


Well you only need the light when it's burning low
只有在火焰快要熄滅之際
你才需要燈光

Only miss the sun when it starts to snow
只有在開始下雪之時
你才會想念太陽

Only know you've been high when you're feeling low
只有當你經歷過人生低潮
你才能感受到曾經的幸福

Only hate the road when you're missing home
只有當你思鄉之時
你才會憎恨離家的道路是無比的遙遠

Only know you love her when you let her go
只有在你讓她離開後
才發現你是深愛著她

And you let her go
而你卻讓她離開

urls.description: Pre-order Passenger's new album 'Runaway’ – https://Passenger.lnk.to/RunawayID Tour Tickets on sale
urls.title: Passenger | Let Her Go (Official Video)

forum.title: Passenger – Let her go
